text: Molly Crabapple (born Jennifer Caban; 1983)Lukas Hermsmeier: Molly Crabapple ist jetzt so etwas wie ber√ºhmt. Welt.de, 2014-11-07 (German) is an American artist and writer. She is an editor for VICE. She has also written books including an illustrated memoir Drawing Blood (2015), Discordia (with Laurie Penny) on the Greek economic crisis, and the art books Devil in the Details and Week in Hell (2012). Some of her are held in the permanent collections of the Museum of Modern Art, The Barjeel Art Foundation and the New-York Historical Society. ==References== Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:American illustrators Category:American autobiographers Category:American editors Category:Artists from New York City Category:Writers from Queens
title: Molly Crabapple
